answers.answer: Hello,There are many causes of chronic nausea.  These include pregnancy, stomach disorders such as gastroenteritis, liver/gall bladder disease, cancer, medications,inner ear diseases like labrynthitis, ulcers/gastritis, metabolic like diabetes,hypothyroidism and adrenal diseases or neurological causes.I will sincerely advise you to consult a physician and get these possibilities ruled out one by one.It is very difficult to precisely confirm a diagnosis without examination and investigations and the answer is based on the medical information provided. For exact diagnosis, you are requested to consult your doctor. I sincerely hope that helps. Take care and please do keep me posted on how you are doing.

question: I took a pt last night and i am not pregnant but i keep getting lots of extreme nausea any idea what it could be also what would cause quick sharp pain in clitoris ?
title: extreme nausua
